ModMetaData.name: Pit of Despair
ModMetaData.author: Sarg
ModMetaData.description:
Store your prisoners in a bottomless pit.
<size=24>Features</size> - Adds a new building, the Pit of Despair, where you can throw up to 10 prisoners. You can also throw food in the pit. Or not. - Prisoners inside the pit won't be able to escape or affect those outside, but they will die if not fed. They MAY also be deeply traumatized by the experience. - Consecrate your Pit to several deities from the Rim of Madness - Cults mod.
<size=24>Compatibility</size> Should be savegame compatible and not break anything. Should!
<size=24>Credit</size> Credit goes to Jecrell for all his awesome work on Rimworld. Credit to licorice_tree for the cat statues
